> _e.g. Fixes a bug where excluded directories were still being scanned._

## 🔍 Related Issues / Tickets

Closes #[IssueNumber] _(if applicable)_

## ✅ Checklist

Please confirm the following before submitting your PR:

- [ ] Code builds successfully (Debug & Release)
- [ ] All unit tests pass (run via `TestRunner::run()`)
- [ ] No hardcoded paths or absolute references
- [ ] No `printf`, `cout`, or raw logging (use `LogManager`)
- [ ] Comments added where useful
- [ ] Code style follows project conventions (naming, indent, headers)
- [ ] New features are covered by unit tests

---

Describe how this was tested:

> _e.g. Added test case `testPresetSaveAndLoad()` to `PresetLoaderTest.cpp`_

Is there anything specific reviewers should focus on?

> _e.g. The way flattening suffix is handled with regex filenames._
